ValidationRule.description: The MRR Upside cannot be grater than the value of the EMRR
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($Permission.Bypass_Validation_Rule), ISPICKVAL(Deal_Type__c,'Renewal'), NOT(ISBLANK(Existing_MRR__c)), Existing_MRR__c >=0, ROUND(MRR_Upside__c,2) > ROUND(Existing_MRR__c,2) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The MRR Upside cannot be greater than the Existing MRR
